name: Soldier - Dragon Quest III
description:
My second model!

Before I get to the model detail, I just want to thank everyone for the amazing reception on my first model. I really wasn't expecting such an outpouring of interest and feedback. You guys are awesome.

Tag: soldier \(dq3\)

Like before, I cannot guarantee you'll get amazing results, but hopefully you'll find the model worth your time.

Trained in: https://civitai.com/models/5245/kotosmix

Sample images a mix of multiple models that should pop up when you click on the full image.

Best weight to use is around: 0.7-0.5. Too low or high and the images don't budge as much or parts of the armor start to disintegrate. The dataset was much bigger this time! lol I feel like I've learned a lesson or two from my last attempt with Priest.

I have the amazing and cool and smart HollowStrawberry to thank for helping me make Lora generating a quick and easy process and for allowing me to utilize their resources. Please give their models a look-see! HollowStrawberry Creator Profile | Civitai

If you want the exact results I have, I highly recommend following the image annotations to the letter. This was all generated locally on a 3070 RTX 8VRAM card.

Anomalies:

  • It's no secret that SD has trouble with weapons, so despite my best attempts, if you want weapons that don't look weird a fair amount of the time, please inpaint results you like!

modelVersions.name: v1.0
modelVersions.description: First version, and like usual, I don't think I'll go back to update these for any real reason. Trained with 20 epochs but this model is the 5th out of the 20.
